description: Square table by antidiagonals of number of routes of length 2k+n on the sides of a 2n-gon from a point to its opposite point.
crossrefs: Cf. A060995. Rows include A000007, A000038, A000079, A008776, A060995. Columns effectively (i.e. except for a small number of terms) include A040000, A005843, A028552.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 14 2001
